title: Ahlstrom's financial information in 2016
content:
Ahlstrom Corporation STOCK EXCHANGE RELEASE September 18, 2015 at 14:00 
 
Ahlstrom's financial information in 2016 
    
Ahlstrom will publish its financial information in 2016 as follows:  
 
Report                                                             Publication date 
 
Financial statements bulletin 2015                  Friday, January 29 
Interim report January - March 2016               Thursday, April 28 
Interim report January - June 2016                 Wednesday, August 3 
Interim report January - September 2016       Friday, October 28 
 
The annual report including financial statements 2015 and the report of operations will be available in electronic format on Ahlstrom's web site www.ahlstrom.com on the week starting February 22, 2016, at the latest.   
 
Ahlstrom's Annual General Meeting is planned to be held on Tuesday, April 5, 2016 at 1 p.m. at the Finlandia Hall (Mannerheimintie 13 e, Helsinki). Ahlstrom's Board of Directors will convene the AGM at a later date. 
 
For more information, please contact: 
Juho Erkheikki 
Financial Communications & Investor Relations Manager 
Tel. +358 10 888 4731 

Satu Perälampi 
VP, Communications 
Tel. +358 10 888 4738 
 
Ahlstrom in brief  
Ahlstrom is a high performance fiber-based materials company, partnering with leading businesses around the world to help them stay ahead. We aim to grow with a product offering for clean and healthy environment. Our materials are used in everyday applications such as filters, medical fabrics, life science and diagnostics, wallcoverings and food packaging. In 2014, Ahlstrom's net sales amounted to EUR 1 billion. Our 3,400 employees serve customers in 22 countries. Ahlstrom's share is quoted on the NASDAQ OMX Helsinki. More information available at  www.ahlstrom.com .
